title: Open Your Legs for the Partygoers
description: THE SEXY 'OPEN YOUR LEGS' SERIES CONTINUES!  First, my boyfriend and his best friend blackmails me. Then the college discipline master in charge of taking me to task blackmails me with my viral sex video.  Now I have to 'perform' at a very special party for very special guests. These are famous and gorgeous male guests. But they don't know that I have something up my bodice, so to speak. I have my own hidden camera, and I'm going to record them as they f**k me.  Let the revenge begin!  STORIES IN THIS SERIES Open your Legs for the Camera Open your Legs for my Two Brothers Open your Legs for the Discipline Master Open your Legs for the Partygoers Open Your Legs for the Empire Builders Open Your Legs for the Forbidden Lover Open Your Legs for the Rough Riders Open Your Legs for the Military Boys Part 1
author: Aphrodite Hunt
